mapper.select: SELECT MIN(o.start_time) as startTime, MAX(o.end_time) as endTime, COUNT(*) as totalChargingCount, SUM(o.total_duration) / 60.0 as totalChargingDuration, SUM(o.total_kwh) as totalChargingAmount, SUM(o.total_charge_fee) as totalChargingFee, SUM(o.total_service_fee) as totalServiceFee, SUM(o.total_fee) as totalFee FROM charging_order o WHERE o.order_status = 'COMPLETED' AND o.start_time >= #{startTime} AND o.end_time <= #{endTime}
